FuncDef: The display twamp test-session command displays information about a test session on the session-reflector.
CLIs: display twamp test-session { verbose | reflector-ip <reflector-ip-address> reflector-port <reflectort-port-number> [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed information about a test session.
-

Specifies the IP address of a reflector.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a TCP port number of a reflector.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 65535.

Displays information about a test session in a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a test session is configured, you can run the display twamp test-session command to view detailed information about the test session.
